      • addChangeListener

        public void addChangeListener(javax.swing.event.ChangeListener listener)
        Add an ChangeListener to this panel. The ChangeListener will be notified when a change happens to the threshold displayed by this panel, whether due to the slider being move, the auto-threshold button being pressed, or the combo-box selection being changed.

      • removeChangeListener

        public boolean removeChangeListener(javax.swing.event.ChangeListener listener)
        Remove an ChangeListener.
        Returns:
        true if the listener was in listener collection of this instance.

        public void refresh()
        Refreshes the histogram content. Call this method when the values in the #valuesMap changed to update histogram display.
